00111         if(m_loLimit>m_hiLimit)
00112         {
00113                 m_currentLimit = 0;//Free from violation
00114                 return 0;
00115         }
00116         if (test_value < m_loLimit)
00117         {
00118                 m_currentLimit = 1;//low limit violation
00119                 m_currentLimitError =  test_value - m_loLimit;
00120                 if(m_currentLimitError>B3_PI) 
00121                         m_currentLimitError-=B3_2_PI;

00127         {

00129                 m_currentLimitError = test_value - m_hiLimit;
